story.intro: You have been pulled into the Shattered Realm, a prison dimension that feeds on lost souls. Three powerful guardians bind you here. Only by defeating all three can you shatter the barrier and return home.

chapters.name: The Verdant Prison
chapters.setting: A sunlit forest that hides a dark truth
chapters.environment: sunlit forest with ancient trees and overgrown ruins
chapters.story: The first layer of your prison appears peaceful - a quiet forest bathed in golden light. But this beauty is a lie. Thornback, the Guardian of Growth, has twisted nature itself into a weapon. The trees whisper warnings. The creatures serve him. To proceed deeper into the realm and find your way home, Thornback must fall.
chapters.progress_context: This is the beginning. The player just arrived, confused and trapped.
chapters.music_prompt: calm fantasy ambient music, gentle flute and strings, forest atmosphere, mysterious, 90 bpm, adventure game soundtrack

chapters.name: The Eternal Night
chapters.setting: The realm plunged into endless darkness
chapters.environment: the same forest now shrouded in cold blue moonlight and shadow
chapters.story: Thornback's death has weakened the realm, but the prison still holds. Night descends - not natural darkness, but the domain of The Shade, Guardian of Shadows. This spirit was once a prisoner like you, consumed by despair and transformed into a jailer. It knows your fear. Two guardians remain between you and freedom.
chapters.progress_context: One guardian is dead. The player has proven their strength but two remain.
chapters.music_prompt: tense ambient music, low strings and soft piano, night atmosphere, suspenseful and eerie, 80 bpm, exploration soundtrack

chapters.name: The Burning End
chapters.environment: the land scorched by relentless heat and orange flame-light
chapters.story: The Shade is gone. The realm trembles. In desperation, it unleashes its final guardian: The Scorcher, a being of pure destruction. The prison would rather burn than release you. This is the last trial. Defeat The Scorcher, and the barrier shatters. You will finally be free.
chapters.progress_context: Two guardians are dead. This is the final battle for freedom.
chapters.music_prompt: dramatic orchestral music, building tension, brass and percussion, climactic and intense, 110 bpm, final battle soundtrack
